trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Classe base abstrata a ser implementada por todos os mecanismos de sintetização de voz.

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Para construir um mecanismo personalizado de texto em fala, um aplicativo sempre deve implementar uma classe derivada da classe base abstrata <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> can then be used as a synthesizer voice by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação corretamente registrada de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> , em seguida, pode ser usado como uma voz sintetizador por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> aplicativos baseados no espaço de nome.

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> deve substituir os seguintes membros: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O membro mais importante o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> classe a ser implementada é o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método é chamado pelo analisador de texto infraestruturas recebimento:

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, que fornece acesso aos serviços do sistema, como o mesmo serviço de enfileiramento e gravar a saída de áudio.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância produzidos de entrada de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML).

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: Texto a ser processado como fala, além de analisar o SSML armazena informações sobre os atributos solicitados de fala em um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instância associada a cada entrada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo do sintetizador de voz, opcionalmente, pode fazer solicitações para um formato de saída especificado implementando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> a ser chamado pela plataforma quando ele tenta fornecer a saída de áudio correta.

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um implementador também pode fornecer suporte para gerenciar definições externas de pronúncia ou dicionários, por sua implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Nome completo da chave do Registro para o Token de Voz associado à implementação do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />.

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: mecanismo.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> com base em uma chave do Registro de Token de Voz apropriada.

trans-unit.source: Calls to this constructor are typically generated by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications selecting a synthesizer voice to be used by an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas para esse construtor normalmente são geradas pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> com base em aplicativos selecionando uma voz sintetizador a ser usado por uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> must be register under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> deve ser o registro em HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see langword="System.Uri" /> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância válida de <see langword="System.Uri" /> que indica o local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o tipo de mídia do léxico.

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de mídia não diferenciam maiúsculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a uma interface <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> usada para interagir com a infraestrutura da plataforma.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implemented by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um léxico ao <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implementado pela instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia especificada com uma letra de pronúncia apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and using the synthesizer voice implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é chamado pela infraestrutura de plataforma em resposta a um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> com base em aplicativos que chamam <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> e usando a voz do sintetizador implementada pelo atual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instância.

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `mediaType` geralmente é uma especificação de MIME, pois a especificação SSML usa MIME para especificações de mídia.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> uses the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed in to load a lexicon from a resource.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> usa o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passado para carregar um léxico de um recurso.

trans-unit.source: It then stores a `System.IO.Stream` to the lexicon in a `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` instance, indexed by the lexicon URI.
trans-unit.target: Ele armazena uma `System.IO.Stream` para léxico em um `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` instância, indexada pelo URI léxico.

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at <paramref name="uri" />.
trans-unit.target: É responsabilidade da implementação para ser totalmente familiarizado com e ser capaz de processar o léxico armazenado em <paramref name="uri" />.

trans-unit.source: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it adds.
trans-unit.target: A implementação também deve controlar e gerenciar os tempos de vida de todos os dicionários adiciona.

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat" /> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Membro válido da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat" /> que indica o tipo de formato de saída de áudio solicitado.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see langword="struct" /> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the <c>speakOutputFormat</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Um ponteiro para um <see langword="struct" /> que contém a configuração de detalhes para o tipo de formato de áudio solicitado pelo argumento <c>speakOutputFormat</c>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a melhor correspondência de saída de áudio compatível com uma determinada resposta de mecanismo sintetização a uma solicitação ao mecanismo sintetizador para suporte a um determinado formato de saída.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <see langword="IntPtr" /> instance referring to a <see langword="struct" /> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma instância <see langword="IntPtr" /> válida referindo-se a um <see langword="struct" /> que contém informações detalhadas sobre o formato de saída.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura usada como `targetWaveFormat` e retornado pelo método deve compatível com o `WAVEFORMATEX` disponível em SAPI, e o valor retornado deve ser alocado usando `CoTaskMemAlloc`.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: O `struct` deve fornecer a funcionalidade equivalente a:

trans-unit.source: The sample implementation below validates selected inputs, using them if they are within tolerances, otherwise using default values.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de exemplo a seguir valida entradas selecionadas, usá-los se eles estão dentro de tolerâncias, caso contrário, usando valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Object inheriting from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> should examine the requested output format as specified by <paramref name="targetWaveFormat" /> and return the closest format that it supports.
trans-unit.target: Objeto herdado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> deve examinar o formato de saída solicitado conforme especificado pelas <paramref name="targetWaveFormat" /> e retornar o formato mais próximo que ele suporta.

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see langword="System.Uri" /> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância válida de <see langword="System.Uri" /> que indica o local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a uma interface <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> passada pela infraestrutura de plataforma para permitir o acesso aos recursos de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implemented by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Remove um léxico carregado no momento pelo <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implementado pela atual instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia especificada com uma letra de pronúncia apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the synthesizer voice implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é chamado em resposta a um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> com base em aplicativos que chamam <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> e usando a voz do sintetizador implementada pelo atual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instância.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> uses the lexicon URI to query an instance `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` for the `System.IO.Stream`, closes the stream and removes the uri referring to the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> usa o URI do léxico para consultar uma instância `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` para o `System.IO.Stream`, fecha o fluxo e remove o uri que faz referência para o dicionário.

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at <paramref name="uri" />.
trans-unit.target: É responsabilidade da implementação para ser totalmente familiarizado com e ser capaz de processar o léxico armazenado em <paramref name="uri" />.

trans-unit.source: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it removes.
trans-unit.target: A implementação também deve controlar e gerenciar os tempos de vida de todos os dicionários remove.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de instâncias <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> contendo o texto a ser renderizado em fala.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="IntPtr" /> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="IntPtr" /> apontando para uma estrutura que contém o formato de saída de áudio.

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a uma interface <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> passada pela infraestrutura de plataforma para permitir o acesso aos recursos de infraestrutura.

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza a matriz <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> especificada no formato de saída especificado.

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura usada como `waveHeader` e retornado pelo método deve compatível com o `WAVEFORMATEX` disponível em SAPI.

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: O `struct` deve fornecer a funcionalidade equivalente a:

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesizer implements using <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> and <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> work as filters or intermediaries between synthesizer applications constructed using the platform infrastructure through the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Synthesis" /> namespace and underlying system speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: Sintetizador personalizada implementa usando <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> e <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> funcionam como intermediários entre aplicativos do sintetizador construídos usando a infraestrutura da plataforma através dos membros de ou de filtros a <see cref="N:System.Speech.Synthesis" /> namespace e mecanismos de síntese de fala de sistema subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> implementation:
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> implementação:

trans-unit.source: Traps or modify aspects of the incoming <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> objects
trans-unit.target: Armadilhas ou modificar os aspectos de entrada <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> objetos

trans-unit.source: Generates any necessary events using the site reference to a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> instance
trans-unit.target: Gera todos os eventos necessários usando a referência de site para um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> instância

trans-unit.source: Generates the actual synthesized speech.
trans-unit.target: Gera a falas sintetizadas real.

trans-unit.source: Generation of speech is most typically done by calling <c>Speak</c> on one of the speech rendering engines provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Geração de fala geralmente é feita chamando <c>Speak</c> em um a fala renderização mecanismos fornecidos pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: If one of the available speech rendering engines is not used, a object inheriting from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> must create its own speech rendering engine.
trans-unit.target: Se um dos mecanismos de renderização disponíveis de fala não for usado, um objeto que herda de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> deve criar seu próprio mecanismo de renderização de fala.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <c>Speak</c> method on obtained using the registry and reflection.
trans-unit.target: Acesse o <c>Speak</c> método obtido usando o registro e reflexão.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.#ctor(System.String)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon(System.Uri,System.String,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon(System.Uri,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat,System.IntPtr)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />, você deve substituir os seguintes membros: <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.#ctor(System.String)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon(System.Uri,System.String,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon(System.Uri,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat,System.IntPtr)" />, e <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />.
